entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Waskesiu Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskesiu Lake 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: SSE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to flurries this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
